channel.title: [VFM] Gay Mafia 3: The Game: The Movie [-666/8] ANITA BRYANT WINS
channel.description:
# Welcome to Gay Mafia 3: The Game: The Movie
## Hosted by @GGhana and @Whysper
This setup follows simple forum rules; https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/official-forum-mafia-and-forum-of-lies-rules/78926 https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/global-forum-discord-game-meta-rules-please-read-first/244
Gameplay
Days will be 48 hours long, or shorter if someone is executed. Nights will be 24 hours long. Actions are done by messaging me on your class card The mafia team will talk through a forum PM or a discord server. The faction kill is mandatory flavour will be NAI Alts will be allowed. So will alt speculation.
Executions
To vote someone say“ /vote [player] ” There will be a day one execution. Executions end the day. Executions will be plurality and majority Executions are Mandatory
To Join
To join, please ‘/in’
Role List
<big> Kids with Guns </big>
Mafia Suicide Bomber Mafia Goon Town 1-Shot Vigilante Innocent Child Townie Townie Townie Townie
**Example Role Card**
> # [color=green] Banana, the Vanilla Townie [/color] > > ![banana|690x460](upload://ioGf4L2lW3cIuBrStI7LADtHjVQ.jpeg) > > You have no abilities other than your voice and your vote. > > > > Eliminate anyone who seeks to defeat the Town
> # [color=green] Banana, The 1-Shot Vigilante [/color] > > ![banana|690x460](upload://ioGf4L2lW3cIuBrStI7LADtHjVQ.jpeg) > > Once per game at night, you may pick a player. You kill them. > > > > Eliminate anyone who seeks to defeat the Town
> # [color=green] Banana, the Innocent Child [/color] > > ![banana|690x460](upload://ioGf4L2lW3cIuBrStI7LADtHjVQ.jpeg) > > Once per game you may ask the host to reveal you as town at any point > > > > Eliminate anyone who seeks to defeat the Town
> # [color=red] Banana, the Mafia Suicide Bomber [/color] > > ![banana|690x460](upload://ioGf4L2lW3cIuBrStI7LADtHjVQ.jpeg) > > Once per game, you may kill a player at any time. This will kill you as well. > > > > Eliminate anyone who seeks to defeat the Mafia
> # [color=red] Banana, the Mafia Goon [/color] > > ![banana|690x460](upload://ioGf4L2lW3cIuBrStI7LADtHjVQ.jpeg) > > You have no abilities other than your voice and your vote. > > > > Eliminate anyone who seeks to defeat the Mafia
Players: 1 - Min 2 - ~~Marluxion~~ [color=Red] (a Catboy, Mafia Suicide Bomber) [/color] Died Night 1 3 - Nightingale 4 - UwU 5 - ~~Trochi~~ ~~YouButWorse~~ [color=Green] (Harvey Milk, Vanilla Townie) [/color] Executed Day 1 6 - ~~Eli~~ [color=Green] (The Prince, Innocent Child) [/color] Died Night 1 7 - ~~Derps~~ [color=Green] (Tabby, 1-shot Vigliante) [/color] Died Night 1 8 - Gorta
Backups
- Katze - Youbutworse - Chloe
Spectators (informed or uninformed)
- Arctic (informed) - Datbird (informed) - Pigeon (Uninformed) - Arete (Informed) - Amelia (informed) - Jane (Uninformed) - Marshal (Informed) - Light (uninformed - Conduit (informed)
